item.description:
As a semblance to the WALK & TALK meetup every Monday evening, we've now set aside a special time for our 4 legged friends! So now let’s walk, talk, pull, get pulled, say NO, break-up Alpha challenges,  and,  well  you  know    (I have extra bags)!

 

 

 

 

 

My Leah, a herding, Cardigan Welch Corgi, has a great instinct for keeping a group together. But I want her to learn to interact well with her new dog friends. So I need to develop her social skills and this doggie meetup will be great for that. So what’s your dog like? Do they need, or would they(you) like to develop their social skills too? Well bring them down and let’s find out!

We’ll meet between 5:10 - 5:20 pm at the concert park benches just across the street from Heritage Ice Cream & Restaurant. My cell #; (603) 759-9876

This is also a PEOPLE FRIENDLY WALK.

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Let’s Get the Dogs Out!
